title: Dihydromyricetin Improves Myocardial Functioning by Influencing Autophagy Through SNHG17/Mir-34a/SIDT2 Axis.
abstract: Diabetic cardiomyopathy (DCM) is a common and severe complication of Diabetes Mellitus (DM). Dihydromyricetin (DHM) is a flavonoid compound with potential cardioprotective effects, but the mechanism of DHM in diabetes-induced myocardial damage and autophagy is not fully understood.
